title: The Betrayal of Trust
description: Edward feels guilty and uncertain after Lila is captured by Caspian's forces. Emily provides him with a new plan to rescue Lila and continue the fight against the vampires.

sections.name: Section 1: Capture and Guilt
sections.description: Lila is captured by Caspian's forces, leaving Edward feeling guilty and uncertain about his next move. He struggles to come to terms with the fact that he was unable to protect her.

sections.name: Section 2: Emily's New Plan
sections.description: Emily provides Edward with a new plan to rescue Lila and continue the fight against the vampires. She reveals that she has been gathering information about the vampire's movements and has identified a weak point in their defenses.

sections.name: Section 3: Infiltration Plan
sections.description: Edward and Emily come up with a plan to infiltrate the castle and rescue Lila. They will use Emily's knowledge of the vampire's movements to sneak past their guards and make their way to Lila's cell.

sections.name: Section 4: The Rescue
sections.description: Edward and Emily put their plan into action, sneaking into the castle and making their way to Lila's cell. They rescue her just as Caspian is about to interrogate her.

sections.name: Section 5: Aftermath
sections.description: After rescuing Lila, Edward and Emily regroup with Jasper and the other rebels. They discuss their next move and come up with a plan to take down Caspian and his forces once and for all.
